attributes.action: Have more houses available to single parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Me and my 16 month old son are homeless no one is willing to help us. I have been on the council list for 10 months and they are aware of my situation and still I have no help. Ive tried to go private rented but to do that you have to pay a bond of around 300 to 500 pounds, were is a single parent going to get that sort of money from. we both need stability in our lives but no one will help us, It is ludicrias how immigrants get houses thrown at them. And people in my situation don,t recieve help at all.
